attributes.action: I no longer wish to pay the BBC licence fee, the corporation needs to be privatised and no longer a burden to the British public.
attributes.additional_details:
I no longer wish to pay the BBC licence fee, the corporation needs to be privatised and no longer be a burden to the British public.

It's a disgrace how the management conduct themselves and the remuneration that they receive.

In my opinion since the Jimmy Savile case, the management team have blatantly tried to covert Justice and still hide those who were also involved.
